mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT m.perms FROM t_menu m INNER JOIN t_role_menu rm ON m.id = rm.menu_id WHERE rm.role_id = #{roleId} AND m.is_disable = 0

SELECT DISTINCT m.id, m.parent_id, m.menu_name, m.menu_type, m.path, m.icon, m.order_num, m.component, m.is_hidden FROM t_menu m left join t_role_menu rm on m.id = rm.menu_id left join t_user_role ur on rm.role_id = ur.role_id left join t_article a on ur.user_id = a.user_id where m.menu_type in ('M', 'C') and m.is_disable = 0 and m.is_hidden = 0 AND ur.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY m.parent_id, m.order_num
